abstract: Pres Obama is expected to announce new program to lower monthly loan payments for some students graduating in 2012 and thereafter; program will also allow some loan consolidation at a lower interest rate.
snippet: An expansion of the income-based college-loan repayment program is expected on Wednesday, lowering monthly payments and allowing some loan consolidation.
lead_paragraph: An expansion of the income-based college-loan repayment program is expected on Wednesday, lowering monthly payments and allowing some loan consolidation.

headline.main: President to Ease Student Loan Burden for Low-Income Graduates
headline.print_headline: President to Ease Student Loan Burden for Low-Income Graduates
headline.seo: President to Ease Student-Loan Burden for Low-Income Graduates
